        public <any> handleError(HttpServletRequest request)
        Notifies of internal server error
        Parameters:
        request - (an HttpServletRequest object)
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity (ResponseError with given message wrapped in ResponseEntity to allow it to be returned from a controller method)

      • handleException

        public <any> handleException(MethodArgumentNotValidException e)
        Handles the exception thrown when when invalid input is sent to a controller (more specifically, when validation on an argument annotated with @Valid fails.)
        Parameters:
        e - (the exception object)
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity (ResponseError with given message and the details to associate with this error wrapped in ResponseEntity to allow it to be returned from a controller method)
